item.title: Report X-2025041299
item.description:
Report X-2025041299

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-18T21:15:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-17
  • City: KERNERSVILLE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF FREIGHT SYSTEM, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ABF stated when ABF forklift operator was loading the pallet into trailer 504767 he punctured what seems to be one 5 gallon pail which caused 5 gallons to spill onto the trailer floor and yard. No storm drains or waterways have been effected. ~~~CURA has been contacted for clean up. CURA stated they did not think this will be EPA reportable and I told them this will need to be pressure washed and recouped.
